participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Insecure yet passionate, Liam struggles with the fear of clowns while channeling his energy into hands-on activities like gardening.
participant_1.background: i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.name: Dr. Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Caring and ambitious, Emily balances her demanding career as a doctor while nurturing her daughter's extraordinary talents.
participant_2.background: i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.
